title: Scary Stories #5: Boo!
description:
A bunch of scary tales in our annual Halloween episode!

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jeff Barr, Stacy Keene, Ron Butchko, Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds, Melissa Murphy, Beowulf Jones, Sara Benincasa, Candace Carter, John Flynn, Le Butcherettes, Screamin' Jay Hawkins, kevin Allison)
